script.title: Query to Sheet
script.description: Copy the contents of a query into a Google Sheet.
instructions: Specify the sheet and the query.
Leave range blank or set to A2 to insert one line down.
The range is cleared before the sheet is written to.
To select a table use SELECT * FROM table.

field.name: query
field.description: Query to pull data from the table.

field.name: sheet
field.description: Either sheet url or sheet name.

field.name: tab
field.description: Name of the tab where to put the data.

field.name: range
field.description: Range in the sheet to place the data, leave blank for whole sheet.
